newsitem.title: USA: MidAmerican Energy Holdings Co net up.
newsitem.headline: MidAmerican Energy Holdings Co net up.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)

NOTE: Q4 1996 results include $29.7 million or $0.29 a share continuing operations income and a $1.3 million or $0.01 loss from discontinued operations. Q4 1996 also includes $0.09 a share in write-downs of nonregulated investments.
Q4 1995 results include $25.7 million or $0.26 a share income from continuing operations and income of $1.1 million or $0.01 a share income from discontinued operations.
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Full-year 1996 results include $143.8 million or $1.43 a share in income from continuing operations and $12.7 million or $0.13 a share loss from discontinued operations.
Full-year 1995 results include $119.7 million or $1.19 a share income from continuing operations and $3.1 million or $0.03 a share income from discontinued operations.
Full-year 1996 results include $0.09 a share write-down for non-regulated investments taken in Q4 and $0.05 a share in costs for merger proposal.
